article: Hello, everyone! My name is Ken. I'm  _  years old. I was born in 1999. My birthday is  October 1st  . That's National Day . I like music very much and I  _  like sports. My birthday is coming. My mother  wants to  buy a beautiful shirt  _  me. On Sunday, she  _  me to a big  _  store. There are  many  shirts and they are  _  blue, yellow and red. She selects a blue one. It looks cool. My father gives me some CDs and a  _  . He knows what I like. He wishes me to play sports more. I am very  _  . And my sister, Monica, she is only two years old, so she can't buy anything for me.  _  she sings a great song for me. It's  really  fun. And I like her so much. My parents want to have a  birthday party  for me at home this year. My friends will come to it. We can play together. It's very exciting  to play with  my friends in my house.
